member.name: T:Rhino.Queues.Utils.GuidCombGenerator
member.summary: Generates values using a strategy suggested Jimmy Nilsson's article on informit.com.

remarks.p: The comb algorithm is designed to make the use of GUIDs as Primary Keys, Foreign Keys, and Indexes nearly as efficient as ints.
This code was modifed based on Donald Mull's contributor to the NHibernate source.

member.name: M:Rhino.Queues.Utils.GuidCombGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Generate a new using the comb algorithm.

member.name: T:Rhino.Queues.Utils.MonoHttpUtility
member.summary: We have to use this stupid trick because HttpUtility.UrlEncode / Decode uses HttpContext.Current under the covers, which doesn't work in IIS7 Application_Start
